description: The product used by the OnSolve Customer - MIR3 or SWN
name: OnSolve Product

description: The number of days before polling runs are removed from the task system.
name: Polling Artifact Cleanup Days

description: The field in the OnSolve tool that will uniquely identify this user. Either 'username' or 'employeeId' or 'userId'. Must match the spelling and case exactly.
name: Unique Individual Identifier Field
